common.no-permission: You have no permission to access this page
common.date-range-invalid-error: Invalid date range. To date must not be earlier than From date.

not-found.page-not-found-description: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Please check the URL or use the navigation menu.
not-found.suggestion-check-url: Check the URL for any typos or errors
not-found.suggestion-use-navigation: Use the navigation menu to find what you're looking for
not-found.suggestion-go-home: Return to the homepage to start over
not-found.need-help-description: If you believe this is an error, please contact your system administrator or use the navigation menu to find the page you're looking for.

system-error.common-error: Something went wrong, please try again later
system-error.try-options: Please try one of the following options:
system-error.need-help-description: If this problem persists, please contact your system administrator or technical support team with the error details shown above.

login.access-denied-message: Access denied. Please start from the forgot password page.
login.welcome-message: Welcome back! Please enter your details
login.welcome-back: Welcome back! Please sign in to view
login.validation-email: Please enter a valid email address (ex: username@email.com)
login.first-login-reset-password-description: Welcome {{userName}} to ProPass. We will take you to the homepage in a few seconds.
login.forgot-password-success-message: OTP has been sent to your email
login.forgot-password-description: Provide your registered email to reset password
login.otp-verification-description: Please enter the 6-digit verification code that was sent to {{email}}
login.otp-error-message: Incorrect OTP. Please input a valid OTP
login.otp-invalid-length-message: Verification code must be exactly 6 digits
login.otp-invalid-format-message: Verification code must contain only numbers
login.reset-password-description: Your password must be at least 8 characters long
login.password-mismatch-message: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
login.password-reset-error: Error resetting password. Please try again.
login.user-not-found: User not found. Please check your email or username.
login.user-role-forbidden: You are not allowed to reset password
login.validation-consent: Please accept the terms and conditions to continue
login.consent-text: I have read and agree to ProPass's

error.email-exists: This email exists. Please use another one.
